lines.text: The Waccamaw lands have known peace for many seasons. But whispers of a dark force gathering in the north have reached the village.

lines.speaker: Elder
lines.text: Nume, you must prepare. The shadows grow stronger each day.

lines.speaker: Nume
lines.text: I will protect our people, Elder. What must I do?

lines.speaker: Elder
lines.text: First, you must master the art of the decisive strike. A Chief must see the board as it truly is.
And so Nume's training begins...

steps.title: The First Lesson
steps.description: Learn to spot a direct capture.
steps.hint: Your Hunter can move orthogonally — look for the enemy Chief.

lines.speaker: Elder
lines.text: Good. You see the path clearly. But not every battle is so simple.

lines.speaker: Nume
lines.text: What comes next?

lines.speaker: Elder
lines.text: The Keeper is your strongest ally. She can move in any direction, just as the Chief can.

steps.title: The Keeper's Reach
steps.description: Use the Keeper to capture the enemy Chief.
steps.hint: The Keeper moves one step in any direction — including diagonals.

lines.speaker: Nume
lines.text: The Keeper is powerful indeed.

lines.speaker: Elder
lines.text: Now learn of the River Runner. She moves along the diagonals, swift as the current.

steps.title: River's Path
steps.description: Use the River Runner to cross to the back row.
steps.hint: The River Runner moves diagonally. Reach row 0 (the top) to win.

lines.speaker: Elder
lines.text: Crossing the river to their home ground — that is another path to victory.

lines.speaker: Nume
lines.text: Two ways to win. I understand.

lines.speaker: Elder
lines.text: But beware the Trader. The Trader leaps like no other — an L-shaped jump that passes over all in its way.

steps.title: The Trader's Leap
steps.description: Use the Trader's L-jump to capture the enemy Chief.
steps.hint: The Trader moves in an L-shape: 2 squares in one direction, then 1 to the side.

lines.speaker: Nume
lines.text: The Trader is unpredictable. A valuable warrior.

lines.speaker: Elder
lines.text: Now, a harder test. Sometimes the path to victory requires two moves — and the enemy will respond.

steps.title: Two Steps Ahead
steps.description: Capture the enemy Chief in two moves.
steps.hint: Move your Hunter to threaten the Chief. After the Chief flees, your Keeper finishes.

lines.speaker: Elder
lines.text: You begin to think ahead. This is the way of a true Chief.
Night falls over the village. Nume rests, but the distant drums of the dark force echo through the trees.

lines.speaker: Nume
lines.text: I can feel them drawing closer.

steps.title: The Swap
steps.description: Use the swap to set up a winning position, then cross.
steps.hint: Swap your Chief out of the way, then move the Hunter to the back row.

lines.speaker: Elder
lines.text: The swap — moving your allies into better positions without losing a turn of attack. Masterful.

lines.speaker: Nume
lines.text: But it costs my turn. The enemy still moves.

lines.speaker: Elder
lines.text: Indeed. Timing is everything.

steps.title: Cornered
steps.description: The enemy Chief is trapped. Finish the job.
steps.hint: The Chief is in the corner. Only one piece can reach it.

lines.text: Dawn breaks. Scouts report movement at the northern border.

lines.speaker: Nume
lines.text: How many?

lines.speaker: Elder
lines.text: Enough. But you are ready. Show me what you've learned.

steps.title: The Diagonal Gambit
steps.description: Cross the River Runner to win.
steps.hint: The River Runner can reach the back row in one diagonal move.

lines.speaker: Nume
lines.text: The river paths serve us well.

lines.speaker: Elder
lines.text: Two more trials remain before you face the darkness itself.

steps.title: Knight's Ambush
steps.description: The Trader springs a surprise attack.
steps.hint: The Trader jumps in an L-shape. It can leap over the blocking piece.

lines.speaker: Elder
lines.text: Your final trial. This one will test everything you have learned.

lines.speaker: Nume
lines.text: I am ready.
The elder places the pieces on the board one last time.

steps.title: The Elder's Test
steps.description: Prove your skill. Win in two moves.
steps.hint: Move the Hunter to threaten crossing AND the Chief. The opponent must choose.

lines.speaker: Elder
lines.text: You have passed, Nume. You are ready to face what comes.

lines.speaker: Nume
lines.text: Then I ride at dawn.
Chapter 1 complete. The gathering storm awaits...
